  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770205280</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Busting the Tobacco Ads</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sprengen des Tabaks ADS</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Éclater le tabac ADS</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Rebentando o tabaco Ads</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Rompere il tabacco Ads</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Busting οι αγγελίες καπνών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Reventar el tabaco Ads</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">In this lesson students learn about the media messages that target teens and how they can use media to create counter-messages. </string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <coverage>
            <string language="en">North America</string>
          </coverage>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">In dieser Lektion erfahren Kursteilnehmer über 
die Mediameldungen daß Ziel Teens und wie sie Media verwenden 
können, um Kostenzähler-Meldungen zu erstellen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dans cette leçon les étudiants se renseignent 
sur les messages de medias que des années de l'adolescence de cible 
et comment ils peuvent employer des medias pour créer des 
compteur-messages.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Nesta lição os estudantes aprendem sobre as 
mensagens dos media que teens do alvo e como podem usar media criar 
contador-mensagens.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In questa lezione allievi imparano circa i 
messaggi di media che anni dell'adolescenza dell'obiettivo e come 
possono usare i media per creare i contatore-messaggi.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σε αυτό το μάθημα οι σπουδαστές μαθαίνουν για τα 
μηνύματα μέσων που στοχεύουν teens και πώς μπορούν να 
χρησιμοποιήσουν τα μέσα για να δημιουργήσουν τα 
αντίθετος-μηνύματα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">En esta lección los estudiantes aprenden sobre 
los mensajes de los media que las adolescencias de la blanco y cómo 
pueden utilizar media para crear contador-mensajes.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Künste</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Arti</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τέχνες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Artes</string>
          </keyword>

    </metadata>
  </description>
